description: DBS package status update. This interface is only open to some stores

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/order/package/sof/status/update')
request.add_api_parameter("trackingNumber", "SOF123456")
request.add_api_parameter("source", "OPENAPI")
request.add_api_parameter("carrierCode", "SF")
request.add_api_parameter("tag", "FP043412484186001")
request.add_api_parameter("trackInfo", "{\"latestStatus\":{\"subStatusDesc\":\"subStatusDesc\",\"subStatus\":\"subStatus\",\"status\":\"status\"},\"latestEvent\":{\"stage\":\"stage\",\"eventTime\":\"1723012167919\",\"description\":\"description\",\"location\":\"location\"}}")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/order/package/sof/status/update')
request.add_api_param('trackingNumber', 'SOF123456')
request.add_api_param('source', 'OPENAPI')
request.add_api_param('carrierCode', 'SF')
request.add_api_param('tag', 'FP043412484186001')
request.add_api_param('trackInfo', '{\"latestStatus\":{\"subStatusDesc\":\"subStatusDesc\",\"subStatus\":\"subStatus\",\"status\":\"status\"},\"latestEvent\":{\"stage\":\"stage\",\"eventTime\":\"1723012167919\",\"description\":\"description\",\"location\":\"location\"}}')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
